wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth George Chipolina (born 8 April 1994) is a Gibraltarian football player who plays for Europa, and the Gibraltar national football team.

response: Chipolina works as a Prison Officer in Gibraltar. He is the older brother of Kenneth Chipolina who also plays for the Gibraltar national football team.
